Pascal, we have had this in our plugin.xml for ages. 
Essentially it is our mechanism for allowing users to override/provide there 
own JDI implementation. Have the rules changed one referencing a jar that might 
not exist to provide for runtime?

The error should be a warning.
Moving to Equinox-OSGi.

OSGi does not provide a way to log as warnings.
In agreement with Tom, we decided to comment the error logging in 
DefaultClassLoader#findClassPathEntry so debug does not get false bugs.

Closing.
A bug capturing the problem of warning has been entered: see bug #51554.
